description: The file is an HTML webpage that implements a database visualizer interface. It contains structure, styles, and client-side scripts to load and display database information and data, including database list, table list, and table content.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from the backend API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets selections, and updates the interface.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing database entries to show their tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and displays it in a paginated table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and injects the HTML table with the data received.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, nulls, and long strings for expansion.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or truncated preview.
